snippet: Federal investigators are facing logistical hurdles as they seek to arrest two former JPMorgan Chase employees. | William A. Ackman’s tenacity has underpinned both his successes and failures. | Special purpose acquisition companies are thriving...
abstract: Federal investigators are facing logistical hurdles as they seek to arrest two former JPMorgan Chase employees. | William A. Ackman’s tenacity has underpinned both his successes and failures. | Special purpose acquisition companies are thriving despite a record of failure. | A contest to buy the maker of Steinway & Sons pianos is ending in a diminuendo.
